block_comment: This block of code carries out a division operation and manages state transitions. The function 'Mult_Divide' takes three arguments; the first argument is the previous "P_Term" value subtracted by 1, the second and third parameters are "MULT" and "DIV". The result of this division operation is then stored back in "P_Term". After that, the state of the module is set to "LOAD_ZIO_PTERM".
